attr.title: Arengius
attr.desc: The whole galactic federation is under attack by the gigantic organism known only as Arengius! With the federation army under attack on all fronts, only you have a chance to stop Arengius and save the galaxy! The game offers 13 stages full of unique hazards and powerful bosses.
attr.inst: Download the game (both Lite and Full version works) from https://yaru.itch.io/arengius and place the zip file into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the game (both `Lite` and `Full` version works) from [Itch.io](https://yaru.itch.io/arengius) and place the zip file into the `assets` folder.
